The Need of Training Workers 

     The youth must soon bear the burdens that older workers are now carrying. We have lost time in neglecting to give young men a solid, practical education. The cause of God is constantly progressing, and we must obey the command, Go forward. There is need of young men and women who will not be swayed by 
                                                                           70
circumstances, who walk with God, who pray much, and who put forth earnest efforts to gather all the light they can.
